page.title: 20WHY YOU SHOULD VISIT CLACTON
page.content: {1.}Sometimes in the summer it gets very hot indeed. {2.}You can get on Clacton Pier for only{30p. {3.}You can win lots of money on the fruit machines. {4.}The hotels are very comfortable and good fun to stay in. {5.}There are lots of places that you could visit. {6.}You could go sunbathing on the beaches and go swimming in the sea. {7.}People are very nice indeed,they help you a lot. {8.}You could go in the local swimming pool ,it is only{37p}for children and 67p}for adults. {9.}There are lots of beach huts along the sea front that you could hire out, some of them have stoves as well. {10.}There are many shops where you can buy food if you are self catering.
